amendment.description: Amendment reduces and then increases funding for the Bureau of Land Management by $1 million with the intent of identifying unused land for potential sale to Americans.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce and then increase funding for the Bureau of Land Management by 1 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Poe (TX) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Poe (TX) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Poe (TX).
